About the Company: Cenlub Industries Ltd is engaged in the field of design, manufacture and supply of Centralised Lubrication System for various machines, plants and equipments.The company has the capability to take turn-key project from concept to commissioning. These projects are basically related to Plant Lubrication like Steel, Sponge Iron, Sugar etc. which are normally approved on blue print stage before taking up for manufacturing.Product range of the company includes Machine & Machine Tools (eg: CNC Lathes, Machining Centers, Presses, Die Casting Machines, etc.),Plants (eg: Sugar, Steel, Paper, Power, Cement, Sponge Iron),Vehicles (eg: Trucks, Buses, Excavators, Dumpers, Railways, etc.),Conveyors and Barrel Pumps.
